topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Agile development tools

name: dbver
short_description: Tool to support day-to-day agile database developers. It includes databases object's versioning, automatic resolving internal dependencies across multi-database schemes, rollback and sql- generate and more to make changes robust and predictable.
